daily_activities: Dining at a traditional Kerala restaurant
Adventure Sports at Munnar (rock climbing, ziplining)
Nightlife at a local bar in Munnar
Museums visit at the Kerala Folklore Museum
Sightseeing at the Backwaters of Alleppey
Hiking to the top of Anamudi Peak
Shopping at the local market in Thekkady

travel_instructions.estimated_travel_time: 2-3 hours by flight, 24-30 hours by train
travel_instructions.route_details: By Air: Ahmedabad (AMD) to Kochi (COK), Thiruvananthapuram (TRV) or Kozhikode (CCJ). By Train: Ahmedabad to Ernakulam Town (ERN) or Thiruvananthapuram Central (TVC) with possible changes at major stations like Mumbai or Bangalore.
